short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grid is a network that helps developers train AI.
short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grid is a network that helps developers train AI. By installing the extension, it runs in the background, using small amounts of unused bandwidth to access public data for AI companies, without touching your personal info. You get rewarded for participating, and it won’t affect your internet speed. Just download, sign up, and start earning!
